entry.title: Ontology Development for Kinetic Modeling
entry.content: Currently, we are developing ontology for PBK Models using ontology development kit (ODK). Code for ODK is available on GITHub which can be forked for further use.
entry.summary: Currently, we are developing ontology for PBK Models using ontology development kit (ODK). Code for ODK is available on GITHub which can be forked for further use.

entry.title: AOPwiki Explorer
entry.content: Tool for exploring AOPwiki using natural language.
entry.summary: Tool for exploring AOPwiki using natural language.

entry.title: IVIVE PBPK based New Approach Methodology

link.title: IVIVE PBPK based New Approach Methodology

entry.content: A New strategy for combining in-vitro data with PBPK to explore embryotoxicity and developmental neurotoxicity induced by Bispehnol A. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.envres.2023.117343
entry.summary: A New strategy for combining in-vitro data with PBPK to explore embryotoxicity and developmental neurotoxicity induced by Bispehnol A. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.envres.2023.117343
